ENG

Real-time strategy, developed by the development studio Related Design (including the authors of No Man's Land and America). As the title indicates, we are here for the extension of their own castle, defending it against aggressors, and prepare a series of attacks on enemy fortifications.

Castle Strike is a real time strategy game, developed by the development studio Related Design (including the authors of No Man's Land and America). As the title indicates, we are here for the extension of their own castle, defending it against aggressors, and prepare a series of attacks on enemy fortifications.

Golf games are the times of struggle Hundred Years War, enriched with a lot of fictional battles, horse chases, or attacks by bandits. We get to choose three, fully playable factions: the British, French and Germans. Depending on the decision, under our command becomes 18 different units, among which we find: horseback, knights armed with swords, axes and spears, archers, crossbowmen, and even bomb disposal and explosives podrzucajÃƒâ€žÃ¢â‚¬Â¦cych saboteurs. The player increases the strength of his army by building all sorts of towers, catapults, cannons, etc. (a total of 25 buildings, divided into two categories: military and economic).

Complete picture of the whole elaborate audio-visual effects (historical reconstructions of the huge medieval fortresses and a realistic way of conducting the siege.)
